title: Lent Week 1 with Melissa Kruger
description:
Join us as we kick off our 7-week Lenten study of Ezekiel with special guest Melissa Kruger. Melissa is the director of women’s initiatives for the Gospel Coalition and is the author of several books. What is Lent? Who can celebrate it? And why are we reading Ezekiel together in this season? Listen in to this week’s episode as Raechel, Amanda, and Melissa discuss these questions together and begin to immerse themselves in the story of Ezekiel, reminding one another that whether we are reading Ezekiel, or any other book in Scripture, God’s unchanging character is the same on every page.


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 1 of the She Reads Truth Lent 2022: Come to Life reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Lent 2022 collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/lent-week-1-with-melissa-kruger
